mapper.select: select sku,qty,udf1 storeId,udf2 categories from idx_v_inv where customerId=#{customerId} and warehouseId=#{warehouseId}

select t.asnno no, t.asnreference1 order_no, b.freightclass categories, b.sku_group7 storeId, c.descr_c storeDesc, s.sku sku, s.receivedqty_each qty from doc_asn_header t left join doc_asn_details s on t.asnno = s.asnno left join bas_sku b on s.sku = b.sku left join bas_customer c on b.sku_group7 = c.customerid where t.customerId=#{customerId} and t.warehouseId=#{warehouseId} and t.asntype = 'PO' and to_char(t.edittime,'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{date} and t.asnstatus = '99'

select a.orderno no, d.soreference1 order_no, b.freightclass categories, b.sku_group7 storeId, c.descr_c storeDesc, a.sku sku, a.qty qty from act_allocation_details a left join doc_order_header d on a.orderno = d.orderno left join bas_sku b on a.sku = b.sku left join bas_customer c on b.sku_group7 = c.customerid
where d.customerId=#{customerId} and d.warehouseId=#{warehouseId} and to_char(a.checktime, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{date} and d.ordertype = 'SELL' order by a.orderno

select t.asnno no, t.asnreference1 order_no, b.freightclass categories, b.sku_group7 storeId, c.descr_c storeDesc, s.sku sku, s.receivedqty_each qty from doc_asn_header t left join doc_asn_details s on t.asnno = s.asnno left join bas_sku b on s.sku = b.sku left join bas_customer c on b.sku_group7 = c.customerid where t.customerId=#{customerId} and t.warehouseId=#{warehouseId} and t.asntype in ( 'TH','JS','TR') and t.asnstatus = '99' and to_char(t.edittime, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{date} order by b.sku_group7

select a.orderno no, d.soreference1 order_no, b.freightclass categories, b.sku_group7 storeId, c.descr_c storeDesc, a.sku sku, a.qty qty from act_allocation_details a left join doc_order_header d on a.orderno = d.orderno left join bas_sku b on a.sku = b.sku left join bas_customer c on b.sku_group7 = c.customerid where to_char(a.checktime, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{date} and d.ordertype = 'CT' order by a.orderno
